lines.text: Oh, and if they show any immediate tendency to break an important commandment, whistle, will you?
Hannah's quoting the bible again. One of these days we're going to put her in all the hotel rooms.
Oh, your maid got in this morning... she has already been chased by bulls.
Well, don't worry about Belvedere; by tomorrow she'll be chasing them!

[to Henry]
If only I liked you a little less and loved you a little more.

[Referring to Maggie]
Hannah, isn't she all I said?

[Cattily]
I'm sure she is, Henry, and more.

[Sarcastically]
Hannah, why don't you have all your teeth pulled out? It sometimes helps.
Stop talking about Henry and you and your rotten little house!
Coffee, David?
I don't want any.
You should. You've had no sleep.
I'm quite aware of that, Hannah. I don't want any coffee. I tell ya I don't want any!
David!
Oh stop Daviding me. Minding other people's business. That's what's wrong with you, you haven't enough of your own. Well I'll give you some!
[picks coffee cup up and smashes it on the floor]
There, get busy with that. Lots of little pieces, Hannah, just for you. Try to put them together again. We'll all be busy doing that!

[to Maggie]
If I ever get a decent horn, I'll have a band of my own in a year.
Let it burn. It needs to burn!
It's the fires of hell, Henry, and you can't put it out!
